alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 4:11AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN ST. LOUIS COUNTY THROUGH 445 AM CDT... At 411 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Hibbing, to 7 miles southwest of Cherry, to 7 miles northeast of Toivola, to near Meadowlands, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Chisholm and Cherry around 430 AM CDT. Cotton around 435 AM CDT. Buhl around 440 AM CDT. Virginia and Eveleth around 445 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Nichols Lake, Iron Junction, Leetonia, Leonidas, Kinney, Kelsey, Murphy Lake, Melrude, Payne and West Two Rivers Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
